answers.answer: U should make sure it isnt preeclampsia
I dont think it is because my blood pressure isnt high and I dont have swellin so I dont know what it could b

U should ring ur docs or midwife,get it checked just to be on safe side.keep up ur fluids up for the time being.wasnt too well myself last night,woke up shivering and felt very sick.because we're all close to the end these things are to be expected i guess,but best to always get it checked out.get well soon
It really sounds like preclampsia I would call Dr!!
I agree.... Even if you feel ok now yoy should see a doctor.
Okay doke I will phone up my doctor tomoz morning to get an appointment

They can check for protein in your urine you may be starting to get preeclampsia and that's a sign of it. If they find any they may give you a container to pee in for 24 hours and see how much protein there is. My friend had to do this twice and they finally induced her because there was so much protein. You can still be at risk w/o the high blood pressure! Hope its not but keep us updated!!

question: Last night when I was at birthin class I suddenly started to feel really unwell got really hot broke out into the sweats my vision started to go all spotty and fade my hearin went a little I felt very light headed and thought I was goin to throw up ot faint the more I rubbed my eyes the more my vision went but after 10 minz I was okay, today I feel ill am tired I have a headach kinda light headed and sick sooo whats goin on?
title: Really unwell advice?
